column1: 1. Update INPUTS section (rows 4-9) with your team's actual numbers
3. Track QUALITY IMPROVEMENTS manually each month
4. Review and update monthly to track progress
5. Share with leadership to justify AI investment
• Conservative estimate assumes 50% time reduction per ticket
- Quality and completeness of knowledge base
- Mix of inquiry types (simple FAQ vs. complex technical)
• By 90 days, most teams achieve 50-60% improvement
• Some teams report up to 70% time savings on routine inquiries
